graphic

Interface GUIController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleGraphic

    public interface GUIController
    This interface can be used to implement a GUI for a chess-game. Use an instance of a GUIController to access the methods of the Gamelogic from this library.
    Author:
    Moritz Rehschuh

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void check(Player player, Piece[] pieces)
      This method will be called by the Gamelogic if a check occurs.
      void checkmate(Player player, Piece[] pieces)
      This method will be called by the Gamelogic if a checkmate occurs.
      void choosePromotion()
      This method will be called by the Gamelogic, if a pawn reaches the other side of the board and gets a promotion.
      void remis(java.lang.String reason)
      This method will be called by the Gamelogic if a remis occurs.
      void run()
      A method to start the chess application.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        void run()
        A method to start the chess application. And to handle the general gameloop.

      • choosePromotion

        void choosePromotion()
        This method will be called by the Gamelogic, if a pawn reaches the other side of the board and gets a promotion. It should implement a menu for the player to choose the kind of piece the pawn shall be promoted into. The answer is to be send at Gamelogic.sendPromotionChoice(String) and should be a String, that is either: "Queen", "Rook", "Bishop" or "Knight".

      • check

        void check(Player player,
           Piece[] pieces)
        This method will be called by the Gamelogic if a check occurs.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player, who is in check.
        pieces - An array of the pieces, who are causing this check.

      • checkmate

        void checkmate(Player player,
               Piece[] pieces)
        This method will be called by the Gamelogic if a checkmate occurs.
        Parameters:
        player - The Player, who is put into checkmate.
        pieces - An array of the pieces, who are causing this checkmate.

      • remis

        void remis(java.lang.String reason)
        This method will be called by the Gamelogic if a remis occurs.
        Parameters:
        reason - An explanation why remis was called.
